body: As a swift action, you may add a bonus equal to half your druid level (minimum +1) on one ranged attack or on one Perception check. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
name: Hawkeye
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Animal and Terrain Domains/Eagle Domain/Hawkeye
